document_data.name: ''Jhor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Jhor the Bleeder''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[bastard sword]] that caused profuse bleeding when it struck a person or creature.
document_data.Powers: The sword possessed a ''+2 enchantment''. The wounds it inflicted would not heal properly as the sword itself prevented blood from clotting.
document_data.History:
''Jhor'' was wielded by [[Ho Mang]], a skilled torturer who served various royal courts across [[Faer√ªn]]. At some point it was stolen by its previous owner and eventually taken to the city of [[Athkatla]]. 

As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''Jhor'' was available for sale within the [[Adventurer Mart]].
